name: Frog Cemetery
description:
Hello everyone! We are FROGGERS, students of BSIT Animation and Game Development at FEU Institute of Technology.

We are developing a game for our Capstone Project entitled "Frog Cemetery: A 3D-Based Third Person Adventure Game About Fighting Evil That Torments the Lives of Innocent People".

In order for us to achieve and improve our game, we would like to ask you to take some of your time to test our game and give us feedback and review by filling out the google form that we created.

Your responses and feedback would be really helpful for us in completing the requirements of this course. Thank you!

Here's our website:

https://www.frogcemetery.tech/game/

Here's the link for evaluating the game:

https://forms.gle/u2vyQ7ZphCafhtJe8
